title: Mornington Peninsula Coastal Escape
description: Escape to the Mornington Peninsula's charming beachside village of Portsea and enjoy a family-friendly retreat on the beautiful Victorian coastline. Spend two or three nights in a self-contained apartment at Portsea Village Resort with daily breakfast, a welcome bottle of wine and chocolates on arrival, late checkout, DVD hire credit and an Experience Passport with discounts on local experiences including four AU$25 spa vouchers, complimentary wine tasting and more.

title: Coastal Escape on the Mornington Peninsula
description: Escape to the Mornington Peninsula's charming beachside village of Portsea and enjoy a relaxing retreat on the beautiful Victorian coastline. Stay in a self-contained apartment at Portsea Village Resort with daily breakfast, a welcome gift of chocolates on arrival, a guaranteed 11am late checkout and more.
